title: Enhancing Machine Learning Competency in Practice: Interactive Multimedia-Based Oral Medication Administration Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform oral medication administration procedures with 90% accuracy in a CD-ROM simulation.
Learners can explain more than 10 cases of drug interactions and side effects along with context-specific coping strategies.
Learners can select medication error prevention strategies aligned with 80% or more of application cases through interactive quizzes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
